mapper.select: select * from gt_m_cat where message='unknown' and stauts='SUCCEEDED' and jobtaskid = #{taskid}

select * from gt_m_cat where message='unknown'and jobtaskid = #{taskid} and stauts='SUCCEEDED' and ((scenestarttime between #{startTime} and #{endTime}) or (sceneendtime between #{startTime} and #{endTime}))
select * from gt_m_cat WHERE jobtaskid = #{taskid} and sensorid =#{sensor}and message='unknown' and stauts='SUCCEEDED'
select * from gt_m_cat where segmentid like #{segmentID} and jobtaskid= #{jobTaskID}
